title: Fan, 1710–20
medium:
Medium: ivory, tortoiseshell, glass, leather
Technique: pierced and painted ivory
creditline: Bequest of Miss Elizabeth d'Hauteville Kean
description: Brisé fan with ivory sticks carved à jour, decorated on obverse and reverse with birds, animals and foliage (phoenixes, dragons, and the emblems of the Chinese empress and emperor against peonies) in red, green, blue and gilt enamel. With a tortoiseshell thumbguard and a glass stone at the rivet, threaded with leather ribbon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 1710–20.
1710–20. Medium: ivory, tortoiseshell, glass, leather
Technique: pierced and painted ivory. Bequest of Miss Elizabeth d'Hauteville Kean. 1923-24-3.
